pullRequest.title: Assert coercion behavior with Hive
pullRequest.bodyText: Based on the suggestion in #5575 (comment), this PR adds assertions for coercions in different versions of Hive in addition to Presto.

nodes.bodyText:
onPresto() could return something that's scoped for a test method or class.
(maybe it does already?)
thus do it lazy, only when getExecutor is called.
or, do like here
https://github.com/prestosql/presto/blob/34504af3ce2a4dfff4fecdb1d26d840787345220/presto-product-tests/src/main/java/io/prestosql/tests/hive/TestHiveTransactionalTable.java#L793-L797
where the enum is dumb
